text:
e="preserve">Kimothy Emil Batiste (March 15, 1968 – October 7, 2020) was an American Major League Baseball infielder for the Philadelphia Phillies from 1991 to 1994 and San Francisco Giants in 1996, both of the National League. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Batiste died on October 7, 2020 in New Orleans from problems caused by kidney surgery at the age of 52.
